title: Experienced Customer Service VA (Shopify + Fashion Dropshipping – Long-Term)
job_overview:
Experienced Customer Service VA (Shopify + Fashion Dropshipping – Long-Term)

We’re looking for a high-performing, experienced Customer Service VA to join our fast-paced, fashion-focused e-commerce team.

You must have at least 2 years of experience in Shopify-based customer support, ideally within the fashion dropshipping industry. This is a long-term/lifetime opportunity not a short gig.

Requirements:
Minimum 2 years of e-commerce customer service experience

MUST have worked with Shopify

MUST have experience with Google Sheets

Strong written English and professional tone

Fast learner and fast worker we don’t work with people who are slow with communication or computers

Fast, stable internet connection

Power and internet backup is a strong plus

Must be available full-time and committed to a long-term role

Personality & Team Fit:
You’re proactive, fast, and reliable

You take ownership of problems and solve them without excuses

You can follow SOPs but also think for yourself when needed

You bring positive energy and want to be part of a close, supportive team

You’re looking for stability, growth, and a long-term future

Responsibilities:
Handle customer service tickets via email (Shopify + our helpdesk tools)

Process returns, refunds, and order updates

Manage tracking info and shipping issues

Update internal records (Google Sheets)

Communicate with suppliers when needed

Report weekly updates and issues

What We Offer:
A stable, long-term position with a great team

Weekly pay (on time, every time)

A culture of respect, support, and high performance

Opportunities to grow and take on more responsibility over time

100% remote  work from home

How to Apply:
Send us:

A short message introducing yourself

Your resume

A quick video (1-2 min) introducing yourself and explaining your past Shopify CS experience

Your internet speed test result (from speedtest.net)

Let us know if you have backup internet or power

Please do not apply if you don’t meet the experience requirements. We only accept applicants who already know Shopify, Google Sheets, and e-commerce CS.

We’re ready to welcome the right person to our team — someone who’s fast, experienced, and in it for the long haul.
